title: Terzo Piano
copy: Please fill out our inquiry form to learn more about rental opportunities.   Capacity: 250 seated dinner, 500 reception, 200 ceremony Terzo Piano boasts a modern, fresh design. With its spectacular location on the third level of the Modern Wing, it offers panoramic views of Lake Michigan and the city's skyline. A light-filled space with floor-to-ceiling windows, Terzo Piano makes a pristine blank canvas on which to create your perfect event. This versatile space may be combined with gallery viewings for flowing receptions that can accommodate thousands of guests.
